metadata.title: CVE-2014-0039 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in fwsnort before 1.6.4, when notrunning as root, allows local users to execute arbitrary code via a Trojanhorse fwsnort.conf in the current working directory.

criterions.comment: fwsnort: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
